name: Super Ultimate Rainbow Pinball (but not really that super or ultimate it only has 10 colours)
name_original: Super Ultimate Rainbow Pinball (but not really that super or ultimate it only has 10 colours)
description:
Controls:

Paddles are Z and /

Launch the ball with Space, and use a turbo boost every 2 seconds with Space

Debug controls: 

Click anywhere to place the ball, and use number keys to switch scenes

Each level has a catch explained in the level start screen

Font used: 

https://www.dafont.com/04b-30.font?back=bitmap
